summary: In this lighthearted clip, a group of friends engages in playful banter, reminiscing about a wild trip where they danced in a pool. The conversation flows with laughter as they discuss their experiences and tease each other about their drinking habits. A memorable moment arises when one friend suggests a sleepover, sparking excitement among the group. The clip ends with a humorous attempt to record an outro, showcasing their camaraderie and playful spirit.
